title: Tablecloth
medium: Technique: Plain weave foundation.  Embroidered with chain stitch (using a hook).  A few areas of deflected element work in the the center of flowers in the  outer border.
description: Multi-color design of a man on a platform with musical instruments - drum, and bells -with large urn of flowers and a bird. Design is repeated 12 times around the border. center filled with sprays of flowers and birds.

tombstone.epitaph: Tablecloth. Technique: Plain weave foundation.  Embroidered with chain stitch (using a hook).  A few areas of deflected element work in the the center of flowers in the  outer border.. 1956-56-1.
